page.title: 11Shaws Packing at Meltham
page.content: Shaws Packing is a firm in Meltham, sixty five people work in the factory. They start work at 7:30am and finish at about 4:30pm on Mondays to Thursdays. On Friday they start at 7:30am and finish at 3:00pm. The office workers work 37 hours a week and the factory workers work 48 hours a week including overtime. Some of the workers live locally but three quarters live in Huddersfield. Shaws Packing packs the products it gets in timber boxes. When they pack tractors they take their wheels off to make them easier to pack. The company gets its raw materials from Russia,Canada and Scandinavia. The company will pack anything but mainly it packs engineering machinery. The workers find their job interesting. The workers get Â£3:20 to Â£3:35 an hour.
